title: Makeup Artist Isamaya Ffrench on How to Define Beauty | Inside Fashion
itunes:title: Makeup Artist Isamaya Ffrench on How to Define Beauty | Inside Fashion
itunes:subtitle: The makeup artist behind Rihanna's thin-eyebrowed British Vogue cover speaks to Tim Blanks about the curation of identity through makeup, and the rapidly changing face of beauty.Sign up for BoF’s Daily Digest newsletter here: http://bit.ly/BoFnews.Rea
description:
The makeup artist behind Rihanna's thin-eyebrowed British Vogue cover speaks to Tim Blanks about the curation of identity through makeup, and the rapidly changing face of beauty.

Sign up for BoF’s Daily Digest newsletter here: http://bit.ly/BoFnews.
